title: Jon Jones
summary: Jonathan Dwight Jones[1][2] (born July 19, 1987)[3] is an American professional mixed martial artist currently signed to the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), where he competes in the light heavyweight division. He is a former two-time UFC Light Heavyweight Champion, holding the title from March 2011 to April 2015 and from December 2018 to August 2020. Jones also held the interim UFC Light Heavyweight Championship in 2016. As of November 2, 2021, he is #6 in the UFC men's pound-for-pound rankings.[18]
